title: AwsIamUserTemplate
description:
A base model class that provides additional helper methods and
configurations for other models used in IAMbic.

included_accounts.title: Includedaccounts
included_accounts.description: A list of account ids and/or account names this statement applies to. Account ids/names can be represented as a regex and string

excluded_accounts.title: Excludedaccounts
excluded_accounts.description: A list of account ids and/or account names this statement explicitly does not apply to. Account ids/names can be represented as a regex and string

included_orgs.title: Includedorgs
included_orgs.description: A list of AWS organization ids this statement applies to. Org ids can be represented as a regex and string

excluded_orgs.title: Excludedorgs
excluded_orgs.description: A list of AWS organization ids this statement explicitly does not apply to. Org ids can be represented as a regex and string

expires_at.title: Expiresat
expires_at.description: The date and time the resource will be/was set to deleted.It can be a string representing a date and time, a datetime.datetime object, or a datetime.date object.

deleted.title: Deleted
deleted.description: Denotes whether the resource has been removed from AWS.Upon being set to true, the resource will be deleted the next time iambic is ran.

expires_at_default.title: Expiresatdefault
expires_at_default.description: The date and time the resource will be/was set to deleted.It can be a string representing a date and time, a datetime.datetime object, or a datetime.date object.

iambic_managed.description: Controls the directionality of Iambic changes

action.title: Action
action.description: A single regex or list of regexes. Values are the actions that can be performed on the resources in the policy statement

not_action.title: Notaction
not_action.description: An advanced policy element that explicitly matches everything except the specified list of actions.DON'T use this with effect: allow in the same statement OR policy

resource.title: Resource
resource.description: A single regex or list of regexes. Values specified are the resources the statement applies to

not_resource.title: Notresource
not_resource.description: An advanced policy element that explicitly matches every resource except those specified.DON'T use this with effect: allow and action: '*'

condition.title: Condition
condition.description: An optional set of conditions to determine of the policy applies to a resource.

id.title: Id
id.description: The Id element specifies an optional identifier for the policy. The ID is used differently in different services.

A base model class that provides additional helper methods and

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: List of tags attached to the user

groups.title: Groups
groups.description: List of groups the user is a member of

managed_policies.title: Managedpolicies
managed_policies.description: Managed policy arns attached to the user

inline_policies.title: Inlinepolicies
inline_policies.description: List of the user's inline policies
